com.pb.identify.exception

Class SdkException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.pb.identify.exception.SdkException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SdkException
extends Exception
    This class represents the Error Response of the Java SDK. There can be two types of error, one propagating from Identify APIs and other which is internal to SDK. Check errorResponseType to get the type of the error.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorResponseType

        public SdkException.ErrorResponseType getErrorResponseType()
        Get the Error Response Type i.e. IDENTIFY or INTERNAL
        IDENTIFY indicates errors from IDENTIFY APIs.
        INTERNAL indicates errors internal to SDK.
        Returns:
        SdkException.ErrorResponseType

      • setErrorResponseType

        public void setErrorResponseType(SdkException.ErrorResponseType errorResponseType)
        Parameters:
        errorResponseType - Set the Error Response Type

      • getSdkInternalError

        public SdkInternalError getSdkInternalError()
        Returns:
        sdkInternalError This method returns the detailed error information when there is an internal error.

      • setSdkInternalError

        public void setSdkInternalError(SdkInternalError sdkInternalError)

      • getIdentifyApiErrors

        public ErrorInfo getIdentifyApiErrors()
        Returns:
        identifyApiErrors This method returns the detailed error information from Identify APIs
